shortdesc.i: Retrieves a list of the accounts of the sources for this Contact.

section.p: Contacts can be merged from multiple accounts to form a single contact. For example, contacts might be merged from a personal account and a work account. If the same contact exists in both accounts, the contact information is merged into a single contact that includes all of the information from both accounts. This function returns all of the accounts that are sources for this contact.
